retrieval.testvector.generator

Class TestVectorWriting

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.testvector.generator.TestVectorWriting

  • public class TestVectorWriting
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implement a test vector writer (interface CreateTestVector). A test vector is a list of association: . Value of each Pixels will be compare with Value

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new TestVecorWriter

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestVectorWriting

        public TestVectorWriting(java.lang.String[] storeName,
                         int numberOfGeneration,
                         int numberOfTest,
                         int maxSizeX,
                         int maxSizeY,
                         int ThresholdMin,
                         int ThresholdMax,
                         double firstValue,
                         double lastValue,
                         int firstPosition,
                         int lastPosition)
                  throws TestsVectorsArgumentException
        Constructs a new TestVecorWriter
        Parameters:
        storeName - Name of tests vectors
        numberOfGeneration - Number of test vector to generate
        numberOfTest - Number of test in each test vector
        maxSizeX - Max X of test pixel
        maxSizeY - Max Y of test pixel
        ThresholdMin - Test value will be min firstValue+ThresholdMin
        ThresholdMax - Test value will be max lastValue-ThresholdMax
        firstValue - Min value of pixel test
        lastValue - Max value of pixel test
        firstPosition - First value of Pixel which can be compare
        lastPosition - Last value of Pixel which can be compare
        Throws:
        TestsVectorsArgumentException - if initial argument are wrong

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public void build(java.lang.String directory)
           throws TestsVectorsWritingException
        Erase all files into directory and construct new test vectors of the TestVectorWriting.
        Parameters:
        directory - Path where test vectors files must be stored
        Throws:
        TestsVectorsWritingException - if directory is not valid
